localString.value: Broken in various places, this wagon has seen better days.
This once-noble face now wears the gruesome mask of death. The eye sockets are bloodied and empty -- the ravens have already plucked the nectar out.
With its bucket head and straw-filled chest, the combat dummy seems far from threatening.
Place this object in any area where you want tracking to occur. Set Will to the DC of tracking in this area.
